Out of source linux kernel build

03 Sep 2013

I recently had to make a few changes to the kernel and do an out of source build of the same. I had to read multiple articles to finally figure out the correct way. The steps are documented here. I had tested this with version 3.2.50 of the kernel.

$ cd <kernel_source_directory>
$ make O=/tmp/custom_kernel menuconfig
$ make O=/tmp/custom_kernel -j5
$ make O=/tmp/custom_kernel INSTALL_MOD_PATH=/tmp/custom_kernel modules_install
$ sudo make O=/tmp/custom_kernel INSTALL_PATH=/tmp/custom_kernel install
